dictionary_deleteAll.message: Are you sure about deleting ALL translations in the dictionary?

dictionary_deleteConfirmation.message: Are you sure about deleting this translation?

dictionary_description.message: Keep your translations in the dictionary to find them later

dictionary_emptyDictionary.message: Dictionary is empty. Start filling it while translating some text

dictionary_notFoundEntries.message: Translations matching these filters not found

editorWindow_message_invalidName.message: Name must contain at least one symbol

ext_description.message: Pages and texts translation, dictionary, history, offline and custom translators

history_message_clearHistoryConfirmation.message: Are you sure to clear history? All entries will be removed

history_message_deleteEntryConfirmation.message: Are you sure about deleting this entry?

history_message_deleteSelectedEntriesCon.message: Are you sure to delete selected entries ($1)?

history_message_entriesNotFound.message: No translations found that satisfy the filter

history_notification_disabled.message: History recording is disabled, so new entries will not appear. You may change it in <slot id=preferences>preferences</slot>

pageTranslator_sitePreferences_autoTrans.message: Use common rules for this language

settings_message_importConfig_invalidFil.message: File for import can't be handled

settings_message_resetConfig_confirm.message: Do you want to reset the settings?

settings_option_appIcon_desc.message: When the dynamic icon is selected, colors will be adapted to the browser theme

settings_option_cache_clear_desc.message: Remove cache if you have translation artifacts or need to remove secrets

settings_option_cache_enable_desc.message: When cache is enabled, translations that have been translated once will be available immediately, even without internet

settings_option_cache_ignoreCase_desc.message: When enabled, translations from cache will be used with non-exact matches, which may cause translation artifacts

settings_option_customTranslatorModule_d.message: You can add custom translators for your favorite translation services. Read more and find modules in the <slot id=docs>custom translators documentation</slot>.

settings_option_pageTranslation_detectLa.message: Analyze text on web page to detect page language. When disabled will use a language provided in page metadata

settings_option_pageTranslation_enableCo.message: Add button to toggle page translation to a context menu

settings_option_pageTranslation_excludeS.message: List of CSS selectors that will not be translated. One selector per line. If an element matches any of these selectors, it and its attributes and nested elements will not be translated.

settings_option_pageTranslation_lazyTran.message: When this option is enabled, only visible elements will be translated. This may be useful to save network traffic

settings_option_pageTranslation_original.message: Show a popup with original text by hovering the mouse over translated text

settings_option_pageTranslation_toggleTr.message:
Shortcuts to toggle page translation
Press ESC to reset keys

settings_option_pageTranslation_translat.message: Enter <slot id=htmlAttributes>HTML attribute</slot> names for translation. One attribute per line

settings_option_selectTranslation_detect.message: Prefer detected language of the text instead of the page language
When enabled, the detected language of the selected text will be preferred over the page language

settings_option_selectTranslation_focusO.message: Focus on the translation button when it appears

settings_option_selectTranslation_isUseA.message: Enable automatic language detection by the translator
Use automatic language detection by the translator when the language cannot be detected locally

settings_option_selectTranslation_modifi.message: Select the keys that must be pressed on the keyboard to show the translation

settings_option_selectTranslation_rememb.message: Remember most recent selected language of text

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOn.message: Show translation button once for each text selection
Button will show only once for each text selection. If you need to show it again, re-select text

settings_option_selectTranslation_showOr.message: Add block with original text to a popup with translation

settings_option_selectTranslation_strict.message: Ignore the selection if the left mouse button is released outside of a block that contains selected text

settings_option_selectTranslation_timeou.message: Delay in milliseconds before hiding the button when the cursor is not hovered. Cursor hovering on a button will reset the timer. To disable auto-hiding, set the value lower than 1

settings_option_selectTranslation_zIndex.message: Increase the value if some elements on some pages overlap a popup with translated text

settings_option_textTranslator_rememberT.message: Remember translated text for the next time the window is opened

settings_option_textTranslator_suggestLa.message: When disabled, language suggestions will only appear when the source language is auto detected

settings_option_translateScheduler_delay.message: The translation scheduler decreases the number of requests to the translation services API. The scheduler tries to accumulate texts to send as many texts as possible per one request. The scheduler will wait for the specified time in milliseconds to collect new texts before starting to translate

settings_option_translateScheduler_retry.message: The scheduler will retry translating texts for translation errors. This option sets a limit for the retry attempts. Set a negative number to allow unlimited retries

settings_option_translatorModule_desc.message: The quality of translations and the available languages for translation depend on the translator.

settings_option_ttsCustomModules_desc.message: You can add TTS modules that use your favorite service and voices. Read more and find modules in the custom TTS documentation.

settings_option_history_enable_desc.message: When enabled, any translation will be recorded to a history page

textTranslator_suggestLanguage.message: It looks like that language is

translatorsManagerWindow_emptyTranslator.message: Custom translators have not been added yet

translatorsManagerWindow_message_transla.message: Are you sure about removing translator "$translator_name$"?

ttsManagerWindow_emptyTranslatorsListTex.message: TTS modules have not been added yet

ttsManagerWindow_message_ttsRemoveConfir.message: Are you sure about removing TTS "$tts_name$"?

validation_number.message: The parameter must be a number

validation_numberBetweenRange.message: The parameter must be a number between $1 and $2

validation_positiveNumber.message: The parameter must be a positive number.
